name: EzloProtect
0:
”Alexa, turn on hallway light.”
”Alexa, set bedroom light to 60 percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Discover how Ezlo Protect can enhance the security, monitoring, and control of your home, trusted by customers worldwide. With compatibility for hundreds of devices from popular brands, you can now effortlessly manage everything using just your voice!

Getting Started is Simple:

1. Open the Alexa mobile app and look for “Ezlo Protect” under Skills. Tap “ENABLE” to add the Ezlo Protect Skill to Alexa.

2. Sign in to the MiOS Portal to link your account with Alexa when prompted.

3. Choose the devices you want Alexa to control, and feel free to give them custom names like “Maria’s lamp” or “kitchen light.” Avoid special characters like underscore (_) in the names.

4. Once you’re done, tap “DISCOVER DEVICES” or ask Alexa to “Discover Devices,” and within 20 seconds, you’re all set!

Start enjoying the convenience of smarter living today with the Ezlo Protect skill for Amazon Alexa! Control your lights or activate your favorite scene configured in our app, and get ready for even more whole-home control options coming soon.


Supported Devices:
 - switches
 - lights

Ezlo Protect Skill Support: support@ezlo.com

Amazon Alexa Smart Home Skill Support:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=G8QQCQL47RFVGAZC
